mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.role_name roleName, b.create_time createTime, b.is_auth_edit isAuthEdit, b.is_valid isValid, b.role_code roleCode FROM qft_user_role a LEFT JOIN qft_company_role b ON b.id = a.role_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND b.is_delete = 0

SELECT qcr.id, qcr.role_name AS roleName, qcr.is_auth_edit AS isAuthEdit, qcr.is_valid AS isValid, qcr.company_id AS companyId FROM qft_user_role qsr JOIN qft_company_role qcr ON qsr.role_id = qcr.id AND qcr.is_delete = 0 where qsr.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.id, r.role_name roleName, r.create_time createTime, r.is_auth_edit isAuthEdit, r.is_valid isValid FROM qft_company_role r WHERE r.is_delete = 0
AND r.role_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%')
order by update_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE qft_company_role r SET r.is_delete = 1 WHERE r.id not in(1,2) and r.id = ${id}
mapper.select: SELECT rm.menu_id as menuId, rm.role_id as roleId FROM qft_company_role_menu rm WHERE rm.role_id = ${roleId}
